article_title: Watch The Best Moments From The Fox Business GOP Debate
article_text:
At Tuesday's Republican presidential debate in Milwaukee, the candidates finally got down to business.

Were there some personal attacks? Yes. But the discussion mainly focused on regulating big banks, immigration reform and repealing Obamacare. There was some actual debating, along with some pretty eyebrow-raising statements.

Watch the highlights above.

Also on HuffPost:
